entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
